headline: Essex Property Trust (NYSE:ESS) Declares US$2.57 Quarterly Dividend Payment
summary: Essex Property Trust (NYSE:ESS) has declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $2.57 per share, reflecting a commitment to shareholder return amid a recent 4% price move over the past month. This price change occurred alongside mixed first-quarter earnings, where the company saw growth in sales and revenue, but a decline in net income and earnings per share. With no share repurchases completed earlier this year, these financial updates present a nuanced picture. Although these events...
